name: places/ChIJF840GCdZwokRNu3dNSpgcjk
formattedAddress: 309 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 309 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I had an incredible experience at D’Shal Salon, all thanks to David! I recently made a bold move from black to blonde hair, and I couldn't be happier with the results. David did an amazing job on my hair transformation. Not only was the work he did impeccable, but he also kept an ongoing conversation throughout the process, which made the experience even more enjoyable. In addition to my hair transformation, I also enjoyed a manicure, pedicure, and eyebrow grooming. Not to mention that the salon's interior is exceptionally beautiful and aesthetically pleasing. What truly sets D’Shal Salon apart is their staff. Everyone I encountered was not only professional but also incredibly friendly. Their prices are quite reasonable, considering the high-quality services they offer. I can confidently give a 10/10 rating for every service I received. If you're looking for a salon that combines expertise, aesthetics, and affordability, D’Shal Salon is the place to go. I can't recommend them enough, and David's exceptional skills are the icing on the cake!

originalText.text: Absolutely amazing! I have been getting my hair cut with David for a while and he never disappoints. The atmosphere is very welcoming and fun; definitely a place for a self care day! I even brought in my mom (who is very picky and doesn’t trust people easy) and she absolutely loved it! Will definitely continue to come back!

text.text: Absolutely amazing! I have been getting my hair cut with David for a while and he never disappoints. The atmosphere is very welcoming and fun; definitely a place for a self care day! I even brought in my mom (who is very picky and doesn’t trust people easy) and she absolutely loved it! Will definitely continue to come back!

originalText.text:
For years I have been trying to find a NY hair salon that is suitable for me. Well, I finally stumbled on one right across the street!!!
D’Shal is a friendly place with a good vibe. David, the owner, takes pride in his spotless, newly renovated salon. He was able to fix my botched up hair color in no time!!!
David is very kind and does a great job. I have adopted him as my regular colorist ! Oh and did I mention… his prices are reasonable.
If you are due for a mani pedi, make sure you make an appointment with Maria!
I cannot wait for the city to remove the scaffolding… D’Shal’s shiny white floors will brighten up 23rd street!!!

originalText.text: I hadn’t set foot in a salon in over two years before I came to D’shal. My facial and microdermabrasion with Lily were heavenly. And David is a gem - my hair has never looked or felt so good! I’m so excited to come back for more pampering soon!

text.text: I hadn’t set foot in a salon in over two years before I came to D’shal. My facial and microdermabrasion with Lily were heavenly. And David is a gem - my hair has never looked or felt so good! I’m so excited to come back for more pampering soon!

originalText.text:
I lived in NYC for 12 years but loved to London in 2018. On a trip back, I found D’Shal through Google. It had really great reviews and upon making a booking for today, for a root touch up, cut and blow dry, I found the owner, David to be very attentive, professional and knowledgeable (in terms of the colouring and the cut I wanted).

Additionally, even though he ended up running late, he and his kind staff offered me coffee, water, and a complimentary conditioning wrap (for the wait time).

David is also very personable and I wish him the best of luck in the ownership of his business. I feel it will go very well and I plan to see hi again when I visit NYC. Thank you for a great experience David.
